title: CoinTürk
author: CoinTürk
content: Volatility in the Bitcoin market is increasing, and the cryptocurrency has lost over 5% of its value since the beginning of the week. The majority of this decline is attributed to derivative traders and highly leveraged positions. Therefore, this drop can be considered healthy for the markets.Read the full article here: https://en.bitcoinhaber.net/analysis-of-bitcoins-market-dominance-and-price-fluctuations
